@graph.name: Ginger Turmeric Root Tea
@graph.description: Ginger Turmeric Root Tea. Fresh Turmeric Root and ginger simmered with black pepper to make a soothing healing turmeric tonic. Add sweetener of choice. Serve hot or chilled. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 inch fresh turmeric root (peeled and thinly sliced)
1/2 to 3/4 inch ginger root (thinly slices sliced)
a very good dash of freshly ground black pepper
maple syrup or sugar to taste
a few leaves of Tulsi (Indian Holy Basil)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to a saucepan and bring to a simmering boil over medium low heat. Add in the optional ingredients if using. Continue to simmer for 6 to 8 minutes. Add in sweet if needed. Strain and serve. Add some lemon slices if needed.
